title: WM's Steiner on Earnings, Generating Big Cash (Correct)(Audio)
itunes:title: WM's Steiner on Earnings, Generating Big Cash (Correct)(Audio)
description:
(Corrects ticker in headline) (Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: David Steiner, CEO of Waste Management, on the company’s strong earnings, and focus to "have destiny in its own hands" by building water treatment plants to tackle leachate.
